content: lastrevised 10 february2024 designbystefaniebold findmeatravelryasstebo79 findmeatinstagramas@stefaniebold sneaker socks noah-marie this pattern is another take on sneaker socks for all those who want a more closed fit above the foot but not that upriding instep a doubled cuff with the same stitch count as the foot provides a secure fit without the heel sliding down heel tabs can be fiddly to work and to be honest my second half of the heel tab never looks great despite being a seasoned knitter so this pattern features some short row between cuff and heel flap to raise the back the heel itself features my newly unvented lotus heel flap where you do not need to pick up stitches more short row at the instep provide a crew neckline with a slightly lowered cuff at the front if you work the doubled cuff in a contrast color a nice color splash peeks out of your shoes - special features - doubled cuff in contrast color if you like - my newly unvented lotus heel flap where you work increases at the sides so you do not have to pick up stitches later - short row heel turn - a crew neckline worked in short row techniques used - provisional cast-on - shadow wrap short row - grafting/kitchener stitch the pattern is written needle neutral so all needle styles can be used dpns one or two circular needles flexi flips etc it took a lot of time effort and passion to create this pattern please honor this by respecting the copyright you can work as many items as youlikeforpersonaluse butyouarenotallowedtogiftor sell copies of this pattern be it on paperorasadigitalfile also itisprohibitedtouploadthepattern toanyinternetplatform thisalsoappliestopatternsfreeofcost ©stefaniebold 2024 sneakersocksnoah-marie-page2of5 sizes my sizes are based on actual foot measurements and not on shoe size or gender you will need the foot circumference and the foot length measure around the ball of the foot for the foot circumference for foot length it is best to trace the foot outline onto a piece of paper and measure there if you cannot get measurements maybe you are knitting a surprise gift the following table also states typical shoe sizes if you have experience in sock knitting you can also just follow the size with your needed stitch count the foot length is adjustable foot circumference stitch count typical eu typical uk typical us typical us sizes sizes w sizes m sizes 20 cm 7⅞ inch 56 stitches 32-35 1-3 1 5y-3 5y 1 5y-3 5y 21 5 cm 8 5 inch 60 stitches 36-39 3 5-6 5 5-8 4-6 23 cm 9 inch 64 stitches 40-43 6 5-9 8 5-11 6 5-9 24 2 cm 9 5 inch 68 stitches 44-45 9 5-11 11 5-13 10-12 25 cm 10 inch 72 stitches 46-49 11 5-14 13 5-16 12 5-15 sizes are calculated with 15% negative ease in circumference gauge 10 cm 4 inch = 33 stitches and 46 rounds please note that this gauge is different from my previous patterns material 4ply
